snippet: Ricky Ian Gordon’s 2007 “Green Sneakers for Baritone, String Quartet, Empty Chair and Piano,” a commemoration of his partner who died in 1996, was part of the American Songbook series.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance of Ricky Ian Gordon's 2007 Green Sneakers for Baritone, Spring Quartet, Empty Chair and Piano, part of Lincoln Center's American Songbook series at Kaplan Penthouse.
lead_paragraph: Ricky Ian Gordon’s 2007 “Green Sneakers for Baritone, String Quartet, Empty Chair and Piano,” a commemoration of his partner who died in 1996, was part of the American Songbook series.

headline.seo: Ricky Ian Gordon’s Work in American Songbook Series
headline.main: Remnant of Grief: A Cycle Inspired by a Death From AIDS
